name: CHROMATIC LACK OF GRAVITY NFT COLLAB PROJECT

metadata.name: The Tribute
metadata.description:
Rimbawan Gerilya and Kinnara  : Desi La have teamed up in their 1st collaboration. Using the Kinnara : Desi La track "No Fear," Rimbawan has created stark, monumental graphics that are a statement of his usual amazing style. 

"I imagined the giant artifact is a tribute to be sacrificed to a nearby star that some machine civilization pray to" - Rimbawan Gerilya.

The CHROMATIC LACK OF GRAVITY NFT COLLAB PROJECT is a starting point for artists I greatly admire to interpret my music.
